latihan.arahan: State whether the underlined noun is Countable (C) or Uncountable (U).

soalan.teks: Would you like some **juice**?
I have three **cats** at home.
There is too much **salt** in the soup.
We need more **information** about the trip.
How many **books** did you read?
The **furniture** in this room is new.
I drank two **bottles** of water.
The **weather** is lovely today.
He has a lot of **experience** in teaching.
The **children** are playing outside.

latihan.arahan: Fill in with (who, which, whose, whom).

soalan.teks: The girl _____ won the race is my cousin.
This is the book _____ I told you about.
The boy _____ father is a doctor is my friend.
The man to _____ you were speaking is my uncle.
I lost the watch _____ my father gave me.
Anyone _____ finds the key will get a reward.
The house _____ roof is red belongs to Mrs. Lim.
The teacher _____ we like most is Mr. Siva.
The cat _____ is sleeping on the sofa is mine.
Do you know the lady _____ is standing there?

latihan.arahan: Complete the sentences using (had + past participle).

soalan.teks: When I arrived, the train _____ (leave).
She _____ (finish) her work before she went out.
They _____ (not see) the movie before yesterday.
Ahmad realized he _____ (forget) his wallet at home.
By the time we got there, the show _____ (start).
The plants died because it _____ (not rain) for weeks.
I _____ (never/be) to London before last year.
She _____ (cook) dinner before the guests arrived.
We were hungry as we _____ (not eat) since morning.
He _____ (study) hard before taking the exam.

latihan.arahan: Change the noun/verb into an adjective using (-ful, -less, -able, -y).

soalan.teks: Be _____ (care) when you cross the road.
The puppy is _____ (help) and small.
The chair is very _____ (comfort).
It is a _____ (sun) day today.
He is a _____ (use) member of the team.
This math problem is _____ (solve).
Don't be so _____ (fear); it's just a cat.
The water in the lake is _____ (dirt).
The story was _____ (forget).
She felt _____ (hope) about her future.

latihan.arahan: Fill in the blanks with (here, there, everywhere, inside, outside).

soalan.teks: Please come _____ and sit down.
It is raining, so stay _____.
I looked for my keys _____.
The children are playing _____ in the garden.
Put the box over _____ by the door.
Is there anyone _____?
We went _____ to get some fresh air.
Keep the cat _____; it's too cold out.
The birds are flying _____.
Wait _____ for a moment.

latihan.arahan: Fill in with (from, out of, toward, away from).

soalan.teks: She took a pen _____ her bag.
They are walking _____ the school building.
This letter is _____ my grandmother.
The cat ran _____ the big dog.
He jumped _____ the window.
I am traveling _____ Ipoh to Penang.
The boat sailed _____ the island.
Get _____ the car now.
Keep the children _____ the fire.
Where do you come _____?

latihan.arahan: Choose the best conjunction (While, Since, Although, Unless).

soalan.teks: _____ it was late, he stayed up to finish his work.
I haven't seen him _____ he moved to Johor.
_____ I was walking, I saw a rare bird.
You won't pass _____ you study harder.
_____ she is young, she is very responsible.
We have been friends _____ we were in kindergarten.
Don't eat anything _____ you wash your hands.
_____ my mother was cooking, I was reading.
_____ it was raining, the match continued.
I have been tired _____ morning.
I saw _____ elephant at the zoo.
_____ elephant I saw was very old.
She is reading _____ interesting book.
_____ book she is reading is about space.
There is _____ cat on the wall.
_____ cat on the wall is black.
I need _____ umbrella.
Give me _____ umbrella that is near the door.
He bought _____ new car.
_____ car he bought is very fast.
Some of the water _____ (is/are) dirty.
Some of the apples _____ (is/are) rotten.
All of the cake _____ (has/have) been eaten.
All of the students _____ (has/have) passed.
Most of the milk _____ (is/are) fresh.
Most of the trees _____ (was/were) cut down.
None of the money _____ (was/were) found.
None of the boys _____ (was/were) present.
A lot of time _____ (is/are) needed.
A lot of people _____ (is/are) waiting.

latihan.arahan: Complete the sentence with the correct question tag.

soalan.teks: You are a student, _____?
She can swim, _____?
They don't like spicy food, _____?
He is very tall, _____?
We have finished our work, _____?
It isn't raining, _____?
Ahmad speaks English, _____?
You didn't see him, _____?
The pupils were happy, _____?
I am right, _____?

latihan.arahan: Correct the sentences by adding apostrophes where needed.

soalan.teks: Alis bag is on the table.
soalan.jawapan: Ali's bag is on the table.

soalan.teks: The girls school is near here.
soalan.jawapan: The girls' school is near here.

soalan.teks: I cant go to the party.
soalan.jawapan: I can't go to the party.

soalan.teks: Theyre playing in the park.
My brothers hobby is fishing.
The cats tail is long.
Its a beautiful day.
Wheres your house?
Dont touch that!
The teachers room is upstairs.
